## ActionsOptionType type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ActionsOptionType<StateOption extends StateOptionType, GettersOption extends GettersOptionType<StateOption>, MutationsOption extends MutationsOptionType<StateOption, GettersOption>> = Record<Key, ({ state, getters, mutations, actions, }: {
    state: DeepReadonly<StateOption>;
    getters: DeepReadonly<{
        [P in keyof GettersOption]: ReturnType<OmitFirstParameter<GettersOption[P]>>;
    }>;
    mutations: DeepReadonly<{
        [P in keyof MutationsOption]: OmitFirstParameter<MutationsOption[P]>;
    }>;
    actions: any;
}, ...payload: Payload[]) => void>;
```
